snippet.title: Mega Man 15 - The Robot Apocalypse | Launch Trailer |
snippet.description:
After 2 Years, The Game Is Finally OUT TO PLAY! I hope you enjoy this journey I made with a lot of care and love to the Franchise! Fight iconic enemies, bosses, find many easter eggs and extras, collect mysterious items and uncover new events that connects different timelines!

I will also enjoy a lot if you record your experiences with the game, I will watch your video for sure! :D
Let me know your thoughts about it, and I wish you a lot of fun in this new adventure of the Blue Blur!

Gamejolt Download: https://gamejolt.com/games/MM15/864417

Itch.io Download: https://pedory.itch.io/megaman15

The Game Is Available In Windows, Linux and Android.


All rights belongs to Capcom for owning the franchise. All materials do not belong to me, and this game will forever remain FREE.
